Twilight (Twilight) - Isabella Swan moves in with his father in a new city after his mother decides to remarry. In high school she becomes fascinated by Edward Cullen, a boy who hides a dark secret, only known by his family. They fall in love, but Edward knows that the more advance in the relationship, but he is putting Bella and those around them in danger. When she discovers that Edward is actually a vampire, it acts against all expectations and is not afraid of the bloodlust of his great love, knowing that he could kill her at any moment.

The Twilight Saga - New Moon (The Twilight Saga: New Moon) - Shortly after Bella Swan (Kristen Stewart) 18th birthday, Edward Cullen (Robert Pattinson) decides to leave her behind in an effort to protect her after an attack that almost took his life. With an inconsolable grief, Bella goes through his last year of school and sleeping alone and discovers she can summon Edward's image whenever she puts herself in jeopardy. Her desire to be with him at any cost leads her to take greater and greater risks, including a new taste for rides motorcycle at high speed. With the help of Jacob Black (Taylor Lautney), his childhood friend and a member of the mysterious Quileute tribe, Bella's heart will gradually thawing, while Jacob hides his own supernatural secret. Upon receiving the news that her lover decides to end his life, Bella leaves for Italy in an attempt to stop him, not realizing that an even greater danger awaits.

The Twilight Saga - Eclipse (The Twilight Saga: Eclipse) - Bella Swan (Kristen Stewart) is finally reunited with his great love, Edward Cullen (Robert Pattinson). They plan to marry once you arrive to prom, which will also mark the transformation of Bella into a vampire. Despite her will, Edward is still reticent about transformation. Meanwhile, Jacob Black (Taylor Lautner), in love with Bella, decides to fight for her love. But the trio's life is in danger when an army of newborn vampires created begins to attack in Seattle, a city close to where they live.

Twilight Saga - Breaking Dawn - Part 1 (The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1) - The joy of Bella Swan (Kristen Stewart) and Edward Cullen (Robert Pattinson), newly married, is interrupted when a series of betrayals and adverse situations threatens to destroy their world. After the wedding, Bella and Edward travel to Rio de Janeiro, for the honeymoon, where they finally give in to their passions. Bella soon discovers she is pregnant, but the arrival of their daughter, Renesmee, sets in motion a perilous chain of events.

The Twilight Saga - Breaking Dawn - Part 2 (The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 2) - The grand finale of the Twilight saga. After giving birth to Renesmee, almost die and be transformed into a vampire, Bella now has to protect his daughter from the threat of the Volturi, along with the help of his great love for Edward and her best friend Jacob.
